Posts.EditableText: how do you make a game over
Posts.HTML: how do you make a game over

Posts.EditableText:
In a text adventure, use the command "finish", which generates a game over message. However, note that any other scripts that are running may still finish and display more output before the end of the turn.

In a gamebook, you can simply create a game over page which doesn't have any links anywhere else.
Posts.HTML:
In a text adventure, use the command "finish", which generates a game over message. However, note that any other scripts that are running may still finish and display more output before the end of the turn.

In a gamebook, you can simply create a game over page which doesn't have any links anywhere else.

Posts.EditableText:
Two  options.
One, create a game over room where all the stats are returned to 0, and the player's items are all taken.
Or.
Two, use the Finish function.
